org.eclipse.eef.properties.ui.api

Class EEFTabContents

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.eef.properties.ui.api.EEFTabContents

  • public class EEFTabContents
extends java.lang.Object
    A property tab is composed by one or more property sections and is used to categorize sections.
    Since:
    1.6.0

    • Constructor Summary

      The constructor.
